import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LogoutPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const logout=async()=>{try{console.log('Attempting logout...');const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/users/logout');console.log('Logout response:',response);if(response.status===200){console.log('Logout successful, redirecting to home page...');navigate('/');// Redirect to the home page
